name: Merit Circle
description: Merit Circle is a decentralized autonomous organization that empowers individuals with the opportunity to earn through play and to develop their skills via a meritocratic education system. This is done using our platform, which hosts scholarship opportunities, educational opportunities and everything a person could need on their journey towards being an earning gamer in the metaverse. All while keeping a strong focus on our companies vision; Build the metaverse by empowering people to be a part of it.
